comments.body:
> Multiple assignment is slower than individual assignment. For example "x,y=a,b" is slower than "x=a; y=b".

https://wiki.python.org/moin/PythonSpeed#Take_advantage_of_interpreter_optimizations

Also, when not necessary, I'm not going to update code that I don't need to, especially when just moving it from one location to another.

My goal is to touch as small amount of code when making changes or adding features.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +240,244 @@        except Exception:
            # not a recognizable host pattern
            pattern = hostpattern
            port = None

comments.body: parent name also needs to be 'safe'
